values:
Wouldn't it be nice if people meant what they said? This anger it grows with every waking hour. Calloused mind against all that is pleasant. Knowing all that is unpleasant. Pour my thoughts for her to see what it is that simmers deep inside of me. Powered from my rage, conqure these obsitcals to be set free from this cage. Breaking and buring my soul is learning to hate. Darker and darker at the entrance I wait. Patience is not a virtue of mine, for I tell her what is not on our side, time... Disbelife I have failed, one more time the ship has sailed...

The anger is growing...

Nice, my dad just blew up on me. Man life is good. I just realized I am about as big as him. I'm just as tall, but not quite the weight yet. One day I'm gonna just snap on him. I hope I don't go too far. My anger will out do any of his tatical fighting skills. It will be a terrible day in my life and his. His fuse gets shorter and shorter as does mine. I mean just tonight, he was fucking his girlfriend in the shower as soon as we got home. How nice is that? I'm telling you, life is good. Fuck it, one more year of this shit, I don't care if I go homeless, but I'm getting out. I'll fucking go full time at Publix. I wish I could go to Iraq. It'd be so badass! Fuck this civilian shit. I could do great things over there. Jesus, well all n all today wasn't bad. Just when dad's around he always has something to get mad at me for. I hope one day when he comes home I'm like passed out from O.Ding on something. That way he'll have something to yell at me for. It's just little shit too, like I forgot to take this bag full of plastic bags to Publix so I could recycle them. I just forgot, I didn't throw them away or anything, but holy hell, he acted like I just got some chick pregnant. Before I fight him though I'm going to shave my head, I don't want his punk ass pulling my hair. He calls it a target of opprotunity. Haha, his handicap ass, all I gotta do is fucking wail on his neck a little bit and or on his shoulder and he's done. Fucker, loathing him is all I do lately. So much for true friends. This needs to be a remind to myself that parents can never be your best friends no matter what. Doesn't matter what they say, or preach, it just can't happen. This is my life, it's my time, do what I want.

Today is gonna be badass! Whoop! I am a machine for this shit. Me and James are gonna hit up this fight thing, then me, Seth, and David and try to get a fight thing going out at the park. Haha it's gonna be sweet! This Virginia trip I took this past weekend gave me tons of time to reflect on my life. I'm so undecided on alot of things. Last night with Hailey... I just don't understand somethings. I really enjoy her company, I truely do. I don't know where it goes. I gained 10 lbs in Virginia and still have a 6 pak! Whoop! Haha, I'm just gonna lose the weight that's the part that sucks. I missed heavy metal so much up there. Glad to be back where I can mosh. Speaking of which there are 3 concerts comming up that are just gonna warp the body. MUHAHAHA! Can't fucking wait, tis gonna be the shite! Yes, shite. It's my new word. Time to fight!
I feel lost and found all at once. I do not know what to do with this...

So what I've learned today, is that looks don't 100% count. Personality is a big factor in a guy girl relationship. Anywho, another thing is, I totally shut out any fat chicks or girls with a jelly bellies. Like I'll talk with them and hold a great conversation, but I so can't be with it. Like touch it or none of that. If I'm drunk enough I'll let a jelly belly go, but no more than that. Past couple of days have been balls fun. I make it fun, but if I don't, who will? I'm still loveing every second of heavy metal. I can't wait to get ahold of a girl again. She will be the most satisfied chick ever. Atleast for our age. Today I gave one of my female friends a foot and leg massage. She super liked it, and my skills are only going to improve. Muhaha! I'll just keep practicing on her so that way when the day comes and I really have to use it I'll be prepared. It's really weird, me, her, her guy friend, her cousin, and her guy friends best friend all went to the beach today. I was watching her interaction with this one guy, the one she likes, and it wasn't nearly as good as her's and I's. I think it's cause I was there, which I don't know why. I mean I could give two shits and a fuck what she does with a guy. I don't care if they started fucking right infront of me. I dunno, either that, or she doesn't want to come off slutty, but she's told me some stuff that they do... I don't know man, fuck it going out tonight with the boys! It's gonna be shweet! Hahahaha I hope Troy get's fucking SLOSHED! I'mma see if we can get some soda for me, that way I can be apart of the fun fun. Hahahahahaha, this is gonna be the shit! Fuck St. Pete and fuck majority of the people here. I hate it all. I say this with a smile, fuck off. Muhaha time to drink niggy!

The hour of wreckoning draws near! Judgment day is here and gone. Sweetly she draws me into her arms. A liquid embrace to chase the day way. Sedate numb, deaf, and dumb. Stumbling into solitude. A clouded judgment day is fueled. Take me under your black wings. Mark my words and remember me. So sweetly she shucks away at my time. So sweetly she draws me nigh. Closer and closer towards never ending sleep. Spin the bottle. Kiss only the bottle. The dark mistress of many, beholden to none. Slips a ring of needles around your arm in an engagement. Eternal engagement. Never consummated. Take me under your black sings. Mark my words and remember me. Destroyer of senses. So take as needed for the pain. Another gray morning dawns across an ashen sky. My sweet demoness beckons me. Ever again and again and again, and again. The dark mistress of many, beholden to none. My sweet demoness bekons me. Ever again and again and again and again. Take me under your black wings. Jacked up on the taste of self-destruction.

Fuck life is great! Cry freedom damn it! Muhaha, so awesome, Hailey went to UF for orentation. I'm so happy for her man. It's nice to see good things happen to good people. Man dude, I've been dancing like crazy the past couple of days. I totally suck at it, but I do it anyways. I don't even think you can call it dancing. It's more like my body just moves... Hahaha, so much ENERGY! Anywho, tomarrow is sushi baby! Oh yea, I dunno what I'mma do after that. Hailey get's back thursday night so maybe her and I can find something to do. I dunno, me, d, and se need to all hang out again. Whoop! So excited! I was lookin through some pictures from a couple of years back, like when I had mass amounts of girls after me, and I looked like shit. I dunno why they liked me, go figure now that I look better I don't have as many. Ah fuck it, good stuff man. I'm still hurtin man, I can feel where David gouged my pressure point in my neck. Work is great man! I fucking whooped it's ass! David, and Eric helpped me out alot, but together we formed a stocking machine baby! If I was there till midnight I'd totally own my job, like no challange at all. Man good feelings all over! I got another talk from one of Haileys realitves today. It was her Uncle this time, it was a good talk and I think out of everyone that could give me that talk, he was the best suit to do so. Father dear hands, why have you forsaken me? In your heart forsaken me? Trust in my, self rightous suicide. I cry, when angels deserve to die. Deep shit? No not really, it's System Of A Down, can't really take them serious it's so bouncey and full of power! Muhaha, ah finally found my place and I like it. Fuck all you other people that I've wasted my time on, seroius man, haha. I really hate some of ya, and I say this with a smile. All good though, one more year and POOF! Brandon will no longer exist. So gonna disappear. I might keep in touch with Hailey, kinda like how they did in Sin City. I'll send her a plane ticket to come wherever I am. MAN it's gonna be AWESWOME just fucking AWESOME!

Down too long like I was before, and I've never thought I'd see the day. Can't be wrong 'cause I konw the score, and I guess there is no other way. Reminded of you! Reminded! There it is all in black and white, and it looks like that
s the way it goes. Doesn't matter if it's wrong or right 'cause by now I'm sure that I know. Never felt so undecided. Everything I've ever had has been taken away. Little boy so scared and frightened. All of the things that have happened I'm surely to blame. Accept your fate then you'll be well, but the truth is that it never ends. You can say you've been through hell. But you'll always lose another friend. Never felt so unimportant. Everthing I've ever said has been taken in vain. Little boy so scared and frightened. All of the things that I do are still subject to change.

Well I was supper happy. I dunno what happend, I'm not sad or angry, just not super happy. Gawd I hate hip hop. Fucking queers, it's all the fags who don't have talent. Someone just makes a nifty beat for them to "sing" to and hope it catches the public's ear. Ghey! Ah much better, System Of A Down, anywho tonight was badass. We rocked out then wrestled. So much fun, I'm so rusty though. It's ok were gonna do it more often and then start a fight club! Bam bitch! I really hate people but I don't really care. All I wanna do now is perfect myself. I will be the man baby! I think Davids sister likes me. I'm pretty sure she's way older than me though. I hope only like 18 or 19. I could pull that, but not any older. It's gonna be hard enough if she's just 18. I dunno man, life is fucking badass right now. One more year and I get to go! Leave all this behind. 365 more days baby! Dunka dunk dunk!

Today was an eye opener. The more I hang out with Hailey, I dunno, it seems to be the more I learn about people. I really miss Lakeland and all, but this is my life now, I need to adapt and take hold of whatever it is that is here. Anywho, she told me I was real close to being a close enough friend that she would die for me. Like that was supposed to make me feel special or something. What a dumb fucking thing to say. I mean, I guess she was trying to show me I mean alot to her, but that's just dumb. And I don't think she'd feel that way if I didn't look they way I did. So almost 17, then one year away then I'm 18. How badass will that be? To actually make it to 18. I don't even see myself at that age. Ha, hopefully it'll be a good year. I've noticed lately that I have become all the things I dislike in people. All the traits I don't want to have, I have. Awhile ago, I thought how badass it would be to be alone in life. It's not bad, but it is not where I want to be. Nice to be able to self analyze this stuff. One of my next phisical goals is to be able to do one armed pull ups. That's some hard shit right there, but I should be able to get if before summer is over. My dad finally got what he wanted. He wanted me to be at his maturity, so that way I can keep on advancing. I guess I should stop hidding it with all my childish actions. Oh well, life is now, and I'm living it how I want. Now I'll just live it better. Muhaha...

Man I was livid just moments ago. I'm still loathing my dad, but hey you can't win them all. Music totally changes my mood. Amazing. Well I guess tomarrow isn't so bad now that I think about it. I'm sure I'll be in a total opposite state of mind then, but whatever. Heavy metal is awesome, like it makes me so wound up that I get calm. Like too many actions wanna come out at once that they just negate eachother. Whoop! Fighting is awesome. Hopefully if I'm gonna fight this kid it'll be this week. I hate waiting. It's gonna be fun caving his face in a couple inches. Man I can't stand him, and with all this anger I have towards my dad right now, who know's what the end result will be. Whoo, the air condidtioner is on, and is blowing right on my nipples. I've been reading alot about ancient mythology lately. It's so fun. I mean the stories about some of the gods' are hilarious. The ideas behind all the mythological creatures and supreme beings are just awesome. Man oh man, once again I'm reflecting on my life and I don't think I have any true friends. Well that just sucks. Ow well, I guess I don't have the place for them in my life. Hell if I know. Better days... I'm not even 17 yet and I'm fucking saying "those were the days." That's pretty pathetic. I can't figure out what I'mma change my name to once I move out. I'mma change the whole thing though. The only thing I'll still have from my past is my dog. Can't wait! I'm a little apprehensive about it, but it's what I gotta do.

Jebus my head is about dead. I've been thinking way the hell too much about people. I don't even think about stuff anymore, I know what to do with stuff. It's damn people. Not even damn people I guess, just people. Like my body wants to go out and do stuff, but my brain is beaten and torn. I think I've finally done it, just like gave up all my "thoughts" to people who really don't matter. I used to watch action moives where the hero always ended up alone at the end when I was a tiny little shit, and I always thought that was so badass. I didn't think I'd have to live that way though. It's not a terrible life I suppose. I'm still living, I'm in pretty good shape, girls like me, I have alot more stuff than some of the kids over in those poor countries. I dunno man, I think I just need to leave. I always planned eventually have someone and I never considered the thought that I just might be alone. That's all there is to it. Yea yea I know I'm young, but I can't picture any sane girl wanting to be with me for an extended period of time. The only thing I really have going for me is looks. And those aren't even that great, AND even if they were, they don't last forever. I think once I get into the Marines, I'll just kinda take what I need and "run away" over there. Just go M.I.A. I'll fucking tough shit out over there. Learn to live on my own and all that stuff. Eventually I'll come back, but I'll switch names and keep living a desolate life. Move out to Cali probably, just surf the rest of my years. I got no clue dude. You know what though? If I were out drinking or getting stoned right now, none of this shit would bother me in the least bit. Well now I got plenty of friends who are of age to buy me what I need to buzz my nights away. I don't even think it's cause I'm alone that I feel this way either, even when I'm laying next to a girl, my body is with her, but not my head. My thoughts are out there. I can't tell if I'm too advanced for my age, or if I'm just so far behind, or if I'm just a plain psycho for thinking the way I do. I got no clue dude.

My words will twist you, my words they bend you, but my words alone will mend you. I can not control my actions or how I think of you. So sparadic, I believe I've become an addict. My mouth and mind constantly combat it. They debate and I wait quiet and alone wondering what will happen next. I don't want to be your pain, I am not your future. One day I hope you will let me get close to you. Solo is my path but it is not yours. One day I think we will become more. If all else fails I want you as a friend, nothing too complicated, and I'm sorry for all this confusion. I know that's how you feel, together it seems like we're an uncooked meal. We don't really fit, but to be honest I kinda like it. We're young and kinda delerious, we don't need anything serious. I know I make you mad, and at times I know I make you sad, but even you know that I can make you happy. I wish I could say these things to your face but it never seems the right time. Until then I hold my tounge and wait in line.

Lock away in a cage with my rage has got the best of me. Time finds a way each day of leaving less of me behind. I find this fight must be won inside the mind. So uptight and confinded often blinded by the light. Taking it's toll on my system like some played out existence. Time ticks away these last new moments. Is there anything we've left unsaid? I'm on a quest for atonement. I've got to find peice of mind, and a place to rest. Biding my time until I'm strong enough to fight back. Hope, I hope against the hope for some resistance. Been taking it out on my system. Rest, there's a calm before the storm, and the western front is quiet. I've got rembrandt as my right hand, and solo as my pilot. Condemned man. Condemned! Convicted man. Convicted! Could not save my life cutting strand by strand. Passing it off like some kinda of king. You don't know peace 'till you've had surrerd. All of your so called resolve, but you haven't tasted pain? Have you ever been inside of the new masterpiece? Rest! Have you ever been inside? Rembrandt as my right hand, and solo as my pilot! Have you ever been inside of the new masterpiece? Condemned man. Condemned! Convicted man. Convicted! Could not save my life cutting stand by strand. Stand by, strand by, strand by strand. Condemned...

While I'm here, I'd like to send out a thanks to all the stupid little fucks who make my life a pain in the ass. I don't even want to talk to your asses, but yet you talk to me, hoping I say something to brighten your day. FUCK YOU CUNTS! Why the hell don't you  leave me alone, I almost never talk to you. And when I do, it's cause you commenced the conversation. So inturn, STFU!

Deaf, dum, disabled, and blind. There is no reason for those to be in this journal entry, I just felt like typing those words. Today was neat, went to the beach with Hailey, my little sister Shannon, this guy Isak, and Rob. We swam to this island, and it wasn't really an island, it was a seprate part of the beach. The nude beach to be exact. There was only one person there, and yes it was an old guy. He laid face down in the sand, that means his penis was in the sand. Like an osterach burring it's head. I dunno, just like "why was he there?" Ya know? Anywho, we went to Sonny's to eat, decided we didn't want that kinda food so we went to Hooters. They had bigger proportions anyways. No pun intended. Then Shannon dropped me and Hailey off at my house. We just laid in bed, we can never be still, on of us is moving, so ended up wrestling. I totally owned her. Haha I know she's a girl and all but still. And now she's going around using my words. Like she tells people that she owned them. It's so funny. But then Rob, Hailey, and me got a moive and watched it and now here I am typing my fingers to nubs. Shew, t'was a good day. It's kinda weird, like all of a sudden, I have girls comming on to me, and now that I'm getting this kinda attention, I don't really want what it leads to. Bah, I'm sixteen I'll think about it later. Well I'mma go try and chug a two liter of mountain dew.

True friends are badass, not these fucks I've been putting in their place. I wish I could knock some peoples teeth in, guys and girls alike. Man the other night I didn't quite feel myself. All that rage, it was totally awesome. I wish I could engage it whenever I wanted to. It's safe to say, you're never alive. Good tunes from Godsmack. I remember the first girl I truely hit on, I listend to one Godsmacks songs before I hit on her. You know, the other night I made out with three girls, one was super ugly, definatly looks like a troll, but I didn't want to cruch her self-esteem, but just for the record, when she wanted sex, I said no. So I'm good to go. The other girl was the ONE girl who turned me down, so I got my "revenge" sorta speak. And the other, holy fuck she was super hot. I'm taking alot of heat for it though, but I could care less, she's a fucking liar, and I hope she regrets every thing that happend that night. Definatly 19, both of us were drunk, and she's gonna try and make it seem like I took advantage of her. Haha, what a dumb ass... Her lies suck balls too. She said my name all night, and knew exactly who I was, and she's trying to say "I thought you were someone else." Like she had some blind fold on. She looked right into my eyes. I mean the person she said she thought I was, I look nothing like. She should be scared for life. Anywho, now this big polish fuck is wanting to fight me, glad to do it. Last time he and I fought I won. I took it so easy on him too... I mean I straight out had him on all fours in a choke hold and told him I didn't want to fight. This time, I will send him to the hospital. If I go to jail, fuck it. I want to watch this guy bleed, I will show this whole town what a true ass kicking is. I shit you not, he will need medical attention. I know after it though, my dad will come close to killing me for being so unjust to a human being. I really don't care. I'm finally become what I wanted to become, an emotionless machine. I still have a few kinks to work through, but it's comming along quite well and at a good pace. On the bighter side of things! Definatly going to the beach tomarrow, and some fight thing. It's gonna be a good day! My dad's girl friend is one hell of a cook. She cooked for us all weekend, she always does, but I want to make it public and give her credit for it. Normaly, me and my dad eat pb and j sandwhiches, or cereal. She always makes sure we have a warm meal. I don't remember much about my mom, but I do remember right before she died she made me promise I would never call anyone else mom. I used to hate my dad's girl friends when I was younger, I thought that they were trying to take her place. I dunno man, alot of baggage came from that whole thing. My dad had to call the cops to get me... Fuck it, I'll use all this negativity some day. Until then, I'll just store it in the back of my mind.

I am so mad right now that I am super calm. I'm listening to heavy metal music, and alot of bad things are racing through my mind. The scary part is I like it. I like feeling this rage. It's like an adrinalline you can not get anywhere else. I think it is good I do not have a car or any legal means of transportation. I'd be in jail by morning... This feeling. It is amazing. Today I found out some interesting facts about a best friend. Not really found out like stuff they've done in the past, more like of how they really are. They gave out my number and screen name so other people could yell at me. This one person inparticular, I hope I never see him on the streets. I will send him to the hospital and I hope for his family sakes they save him. I can picture myself punching his face in, for an endless amount of time, with no restrain. Just blood, and teeth, and more blood covering the ground. My hands are shaking as I type this. I feel different, like my individual person has just shifted to a complete opposite personalty. I wonder if I have become what my mom was. She was so vengeful. She'd try and kill you if you made her mad enough. Literally, she tried to hit my dad with a car, two times. There's a girl out there who I have no way of contacting, but I hope if God does exist that he lets her know how sorry I am. That is if she's telling the truth. I think I'll put all my good qualities into my family. People have proven time and time again that they can not be trusted or cared for. The end result is always the same. It's time to go...
Today hasn't even started and I can already feel it turn to shit.

Suicide, on the horizon! I count these miseries to ten! Contempt is a lifestyle, the demons trike twice! These past of the tint of light turns to twilight! 'Cause I woun't understand better day! Bow down won't let this eat me alive! Crawl out of my hole exorcise the demons!
I'm just a dirty dirty boy.

Psycho, groupie, cocaine, crazy! Psycho, groupie, cocain, crazy! Psycho, groupie, cocaine crazy!. Psycho groupie coke. Makes you high, makes you hide. Makes you really want to go. Stop! Psycho groupie cocaine crazy. Psycho groupie coke. Makes you high, makes you hide. Do you really want to think and stop? Stop your eyes from flowing. Psycho, groupie, cocaine, crazy! Psycho groupie cocaine crazy. Psycho groupie coke. Makes you high, makes you hide. Makes you really want to go. Stop! Psycho groupie cocain crazy. Psycho groupie coke. Makes you high, makes you hide. Do you really want to think and stop? Stop your eyes from flowing out. So you want the world to stop. Stop in and watch your body fully drop. From the time you were a psycho, groupie, cocaine, crazy. So you want to see the shower. You really don't have to be a ho. From the time you were a psycho, groupie, cocaine, crazy. Psycho groupie, cocaine, crazy! Psycho groupie cocaine crazy! Psycho groupie coke. Mkaes you high, makes you hide. Makes you really want to go, stop! Psycho groupie cocain crazy. Psycho groupie coke. Makes you high, makes you hide. Do you really want to think and stop? Stop your eyes from flwoing out. So you want the world to stop. Rshing to watch your spirit fully drop. From the time you were a psycho, groupie, cocaine, crazy! So you want to see thw show. You really don't have to be a ho. From the time you were a psycho, groupie, cocaine, crazy!
...And to belive I changed myself for someone, thinking that they'd like me. Never again...

If I were the angry type of person I could seriously beat the life out of certain people and not have any remorse tomarrow morning or the next 20 years I'd be spending in prison... Haha good thing I'm not. Holy fuck I love metal! I mean LOVE! Not like luv, but LOVE DAMN IT! It's the greatest thing in the world. Haha, it's neat how you're feelings for people change so quick. So I got alot of shit to do tomarrow. I wanna go to the Marines so damn bad! It's deffinatly where I belong. I hung out with Hailey almost the entire day. Haha, we were only supposed to hang out for like a few minutes, but she couldn't get in touch with anyone to go the beach, and then the weather didn't look so promising. But anywho, we watched all of Troy, which took FOREVER! Jebus that's a long moive. I'm supposed to watch it with mis mom, but I think I'm gonna pass. It's just too long to sit with someone. Me and Hailey it's different cause we made jokes and played around. But I took her for a ride today on my motorcycle! Whoop! Haha, had a hottie on the back of my bike. Haha, she's so badass. Glad I have her as a friend. She tried to tackle me, 'twas cute she ended up falling over and my dog pounced on her. Haha, he likes to wrestle, he's so human-like. Gawd dude, then this weekend is gonna be SHWEET! It's gonna be balls to the wall fun! We're getting a hotel at the beach, and were gonna invite a few ladies. We're gonna party but only like 3 of them are gonna stay in our room with us. Haha OMG it's gonna fucking rock. Hell, even if girls don't come, I'm just gonna drink until beer pours out my ears, or leaks out my eyes. Whichever happens first. It's gonna be great to hang out with Gary again. I dunno what to do though, like Hailey is comming, and I don't want her seeing me acting a fool with some other girl. I think I'll lay low, and if she messes around with another guy, I'll go grab a girl and do whatever. Haha, then Hailey is gonna try and stay with us. See if she can spend the night! But she sticks with me, I don't want Vik to try something dumb on her. She's gonna be like the first hot chick I just slept next to! Woo hoo! Haha what are friends for eh? Holy shit I'm stoked!!! And this Wendesday too boy.... Haha SUCESS!!!! This whole week shall be good. I hope dad let's me stay out there this whole weekend though. Anywho, I have to get sleep, there's so much to do with great rewards afterwards...

I did it! I'm over her! Whoop! 'Bout damn time. It took alot of Haileys help, but I've done it! Anywho, I found my crew! Damn dude, tonight was insane! Like me, Seth, and David just caused some serious ka ka chaos! It was great! Like he's so nucking futs! I swear to god, like when we're all three together we form like this beast of fun. I can't wait till the day David, me and Seth all get in fight with some people. We're going to own them. Man, we're so gonna get shot too. Haha, it's fucking great! Anywho work was awesome today too. I luv Hailey! She's like my best friend. She's a super special person, and I adore her.  Ok, I'mma go clean my nasty disfigured mexican body.

Today kinda started shitty, got in trouble as soon as I woke up, so I couldn't go anywhere. It kinda sucked, but people here don't do anything anyways. It's depressing how shitty St. Pete people are. Whatever, dad made me work alot. He had me replace the blower in the boat. I did it all myself too damn it. He helped me with the wireing a little, but the project was mine. Then he and I blead the brakes on the bronco. I so fucked it up, it was great. I was all greesy and oily. I just picked something up off the flood and ate it without giving it a second thought... It didn't taste bad, but still... Anywho, then we went cruising around on our motorcycles. Dad told me that whatever I'm looking for, I'm not going to find it in the places I've been looking. I don't like when he's right, but like where else can I go? Or what else should I do? Or who else should I hang out with? Fuck it, I'll do my own thing. I only got 365 more days here, then I'm gone! Jason comes back like in a week from the Navy. I told him to bring me back some of those super short training shorts. But he said he'd only bring me a pair if I wore them ALL day at the B-B-Q he's having. I think I'mma shove a sock in there. It'd be a bad day if it was a windy day ya know? It's kinda sad I have more fun at work than what I do away from work. I mean the people there are fun to mess with. Constantly rocking out, I mean jesus. Especially us stock crew. When you get the right blend of people, it's one of the best things in the world. Everyone has their own place, it's badass. Gary got back into U.F! I'm so stoked for him. He loves it up there, that's like the only thing he ever looked forward to while he was here. I gotta get up there, do some MAD partying. It'd be pure KA KA KA CHAOS! You know what I should do? Stop investing emotions into these irrelevant girls. And money aswell. Like I should save all that shit up for a girl that's truely worth it. Simone wants me to come up there and visit her. I dunno dude, she's extremly hardcore, and I can definatly see having a life with her. But serious the kind of girl I really want to be with is like the chick off "Clencher" Chevelles lastest music video, or that one waitress at Cio Cio's. Oh my gawd dude, those girls are so fucking hot. No shit, I'd put life on hold for those girls. I don't think our personalites would match though. Haha so what, they're super hot. Someone told me I'd be a good american gladiator if that show was still on. That was the first time I ever received that complement before, haha people are neat. I think I'm going to start doing my home school. I really don't have much else to do. Might as well get smart while I'm bored. Fuck this shit! Haha, this tis the time to rise! I'mma do something with my life instead of fucking around with peices of shit. I have alot to say but talk is cheap. I'mma go get started!

So I'm actually gonna type about something today instead of typing demented lyrics! Whoop whoop! Ok to start off the day, I shot up some harowin... It was great. Hallucinating is the best. I'm just fuckin with ya, I can't afford harowin. Anywho, I went to the beach with mis mom and one of her good friends. It was pretty fun. It's nice to hang around with good people. But like we left kinda late, so I barely made it into work on time. It really doesn't matter but I definatly ran into work like white trash. I had a beater on, pants with holes in them, and super sun burnt. I saw AB baby, she's pretty badass. I haven't seen her in a long time. Work was awesome as usual. We make it fun there. We mosh whenever we get the chance, and we're constantly trying to do death metal screams and growls. Anywho, after all those hours of being in the sun, I'm super red. It's not painful yet. It's all over too, I mean like on my belly and everything. I was using it as an excuse to show off my mexicano 6 pack. I was like "Look how sunburt I am!" Then flexed a little. Haha that's so pathetic. Man, there's this ONE fucking girl, and I don't know what to do with her. Like it's so weird. So many damn mixed signals. Sometimes I think she has like two different personalities. It's super stressful sometimes. I was so looking forward to moving just to leave it all behind. I woulda been able to start all over again, but go figure when I really want to move I don't get to. Ah, you know what's kool? Like today, Kimmie and Morgan were all playing and shit, just like wrestling in the water, and everyone was like "They're gonna get married one day." Since they're so close and all, I mean I guess they've known eachother for years, and they are super comfortable around eachother. I mean I could see it happening, and both of them being super happy for the rest of their lifetime. I mean, I don't wanna sound selfish, but that just seems like a really kool thing to have. That kinda bond with someone. I've moved so much and burnt too many bridges... I'm telling you, I belong in the Marines. I think I'mma even change my name, so that way I can totally disappear. I don't know, alot of stuff could happen. Till then I'll just build up. Music is a weapon, I fucking love it...

Strong enough to blind. The numbness heals. My worth is only defined by the nest disaster.

I was searching for the golden chicken when all of a sudden I fell through the t.v screen. Damn near ripped my toe off in the process and then it started raining eggs. I asked for scrammbled, but ofcourse they were over easy with shell in them. So now my face is blue because someone broke into my house and tried to suffocate me with a colored condom. I wish I could make a sandwhich but I ran out of sand. My best friend Buddy the elf is like flipping out over this girl right, apparently she was kidnapped by this evil guy who owns a pet dragon. At first I was kinda sceptical about the whole thing, because ya know, this girl didn't look too good. I mean what would a dragon man want with an ugly girl. So we took up arms and went on a quest to find her. I had to make a stop at home depot to pick up my ax, and buddy got himself another hoe. So then we decieded she wasn't really worth it and ran over to publix, man that's one hell of a run. Holy shit I was tired. I shoulda got the small one handed ax, but no, I had to get those big ass Thor ax things. I kinda dragged it the last mile or so, but it made it super sharp. When we got to publix Buddy got all upset because he's a vegitarian and publix has a big meat department, so he and his hoe killed like the whole store. Whoever thought an elf with a hoe could do all that damage. The cops arrived about 2 days later and Buddy was pretty fucked up off nyquil, but we invited the cops in for some coffee and donuts. We all sat down and System of a Down took stage and started playing B.Y.O.B, what a great song. Man oh man those lady police sure get all crazy when good music is on, and donuts get flowing through their digestive system. Anywho I'm super whooped and Buddy took off with his hoe. So remember, don't subsitute pepper spray for actual pepper...

I wish she'd just open her eyes to what is really there. Instead she just pushes things away and pretends that she doesn't care. I wish her the best, and I hope she doesn't end up sad and alone like the rest. She looks but doesn't see, she hears but doesn't listen, and she talks but says nothing. For her puzzle incomplete, she searches for that special something. She think's shes alone, and she has to realize that she's not on her own. Until then I'll be her safety net, her one safe bet...

Distribute the pain! Dismembering your family tree limb by limb. Waste the oblivious and shred the weak, fracture all of man kind. Gather the invinciable and grab hold. Be a memory nothing more, this is how it's going to be once I exit the door. Soiled in your own excess lifestyle. Wah killers! Depending on one another a quest for blood drives the powerful. Despite all realization you cannot belive what is said. I hate you I hate it freeze in ever going hell. Get off my back bitch! Throat slits open, head topples to the floor. Happyness comes and goes, but for myself I will never know. Insanity!

For sickness I'm masticating, danceing and masturbating. Celebrate in fields of night with skin upon my face. If I saok my hands in others blood, am I sick? I worked my balls off today! It was awesome! Fuck yes! The only thing that would of made it better is if I coulda fought someone. Fighting always gives you this natural high that you don't really get from any other place. Ok this is the 5th damn day I've listend to that Jimmy Eat World song "Work" and I'm still not tired of it. Haha, I haven't done shit with homeschool. I'm so fucking tired of it. I don't know why you need a fucking diploma to be a Marine anyways. Douchey. Played some tennis today with Mis Mom. It was a good time. I don't know why but like everytime her and I get some place alone together like there's this awkward silence. I hate that, I'm a pretty random person damn it, there sould never be an awkward silence! I think it's just because I really like her. Ghey, see if I didn't like her we would be all kool and normal, no awkward silences. Oh well, man I did so much today at work, like everyone was happy to see me too. I kinda like it, it's nice to have people like ya. You know Hailey is all weird now, she's like "What's up with you? You've been acting different." I asked her to elaborate on that and she said she didn't know, I was just different. My dad thinks I should go out with her. Eh, she's super nice, and I really think she has a great future ahead of her and all that stuff, but I'm sure as hell not in it. One of my good friends used to say "Some people come for a reason, others for a season." I think Hailey is just a season, as soon as she goes to Gainsville I most likely will never talk to her again. Gawd, dad... Man he's crazy about me and girls. He says they'll be the end of me, he's probably right but oh well. Fuck! We're gonna go ridin out on trails this weekend! Whoop!

Whoop whoop! You are my favorite mother fucker! Shwing shwing bring it on! Danb Fred Durst brings out one hell of a person in me. It's crazy, like a redneck, and a wanna be gangsta. I wanna go to a Bizkit concert but I don't think any of my friends like them and I haven't heard of them touring. SHUTS! So we built a trailer today. Kinda nifty, I hate building shit though. The only thing that was fun is me and my dad were making pun jokes off the "nuts" we had to use to put on the bolts. It was great. Haha, I so amplify the immaturity of anyone. It's a gift I tell you. My little cousin, he told me he ate out his girlfriend the other day for the first time. That's one thing he upped me on. I've never done that, I really don't see it tasting all that well. Like even my cousin said it was delectable or anything. He said when he ate her out the second time he put some jelly on it, haha and he said it was the worst thing ever. See what I mean, the statistics just aren't in the good zone with eating chicks out... Anywho, he's big pimpin and all that good stuff. I wanna teach him how to fight though, one day he's gonna have to fight for his girl and I don't think he'd fair very well. Couldn't go to that submisson fighting thing today, I didn't mind too much, but I kinda felt bad cause I did tell the security guard that I was going but dad wouldn't let me. I had to build that trailer instead... GHEY! So dad and his girl just got in their fist fight tonight. It was about me which made it more pointless. I'm almost out of here, and they're gonna arugue about me. There's no reason to fight about me, jebus. Oh well I hope they can hold it together long enough for me to leave. Haha, I just saw the worst music video ever. Vanilla Ice's "Ice Ice Baby". Holy shit it's so bad, and old. He's talkin about his 5.0 mustang. Haha, plus he's just one goofy lookin guy. The dancing was old school, but that part of it was pretty awesome. So today was alright, I got my dog all washed up, cleaned his box, and mowed the grass. I'm incredibly lazy, but anywho I'm kinda sick. My ears are plugged, my nose is clogged, and my throat is pretty soar. I think I coughed up some blood today. My first thought was "BADASS!" then I thought about it and went "Uh oh...". I need to get riding my mortorcycle some more. It's costing me 240 bucks a month damn it, I better get some good use out of it. Well tomarrow I'm going to that submission fighting thing. I'm super excited about it. I only got 8 dollars left in my wallet and that class takes 5 of them. It's so worth it, I love fighting, totally humbles you. I think my dad is about to go on another power trip on me. I have like this radar thing, and I can sence it comming. I was so tired, but I took some nyquill and now I'm awake. What the hell, isn't nyquill supposed to make you tired? So music is one hell of a weapon, what it can bring out in someone is amazing...

Down time is all the time I seem to have nowa days. Like there's nothing ever going on, I'm constantly thinking of what can I do next and what I've done before. So on and so fourth. Tonight I went to the movies with Kristen, Jenna, Bonnie, and the funniest abnoctious person I know in real life, Seth. The movie didn't intrest me much, so once again, my mind wandered. My life is now, this is it, it's not a whole lot, but I'm alive, and healthy. Some people would kill to have that. I just want to get out of here. I mean my life is meant to be in the Marines. I was born to be one, not just any Marine either. I mean like the best fucking Marine ever. Kids will read about me in the future, that's the kind of Marine I'm going to be. This right now, it just sucks. So many people are caught up in a web of shit. I get tired of looking at it. I'm at this phase right now where if someone says something stupid, or something that I think I could help them with, I think, "What good would it do if I told them?" "Would they even take my advice?" "I know in the end they will just do whatever it is anyway" and "Is it really worth my time?". All those go through my head and then I just don't say anything. Example, relationships. So many people are in and out of relationships and they never know what to do, and this break up is far worse than all the other break ups they've had. Maybe I'm just one of those people who sits on the sidelines and watches everything happen and bitch about it. Perhaps I'm just another selfish person who has a bad attitude about something when I myself can't have what everyone else has, like in this instance, a relationship. Jebus, whatever happened to my good ol' Lakeland times? We went surfing, paintballing, beat the shit out of eachother, parited, crashed at eachothers houses. All that stuff, and now it's like that kind of stuff doesn't even exist. It doesn't help that my dad woun't let me get my liscence. It's deffinatly holding me back, and he constantly bitches about it. Like tonight would be a great night just to ride on my motorcycle. Just fucking cruise, hell go to Lakeland and back. Just sometimes when I get into this big deep thought thing, I feel like I can see what is going to happen, but there's nothing I can do about it. Ah, I need to surf. It's the ultimate mental floss...

Trying to "fit in" only wastes your time, your money, your person. Fuck this place, I don't need anyone, just keep the adrinaline comming and I'll be fine.
